abstract: In pursuing Yahoo, not SAP, the software giant may be moving far from what it knows best.
snippet: In pursuing Yahoo, not SAP, the software giant may be moving far from what it knows best.
lead_paragraph: OVER the years, Microsoft has pummeled countless rivals, including the superheavyweight I.B.M. But it has never faced a smaller foe as formidable as Google. The tale of the tape gives Microsoft a $100 billion advantage in market capitalization, but it counts for little: Google appears to be its superior in strength, speed, smarts.

headline.main: Maybe Microsoft Should Stalk Different Prey
headline.print_headline: Maybe Microsoft Should Stalk Different Prey
